hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the branch for the build

definition.script:
pipeline { agent { node { label 'build_slave' } } environment { APPLICATION_NAME = "CAMPP_Backend" NOTIFYUSERS = 'syedza@newtglobal.com' BUILD_DETAILS = "
Job Name: ${env.JOB_NAME}
Build Number: ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}
Build URL: ${BUILD_URL}" } parameters { string(name: 'branch', defaultValue: 'development-new', description: 'Enter the branch for the build') } options { timestamps() timeout(time: 1, unit: 'HOURS') buildDiscarder(logRotator(numToKeepStr: '10')) } stages { stage ("Checkout") { steps { deleteDir() echo "Checkout the code" git branch: "${params.branch}", credentialsId: 'Syed_Git', url: 'https://github.com/newtadmin3/barclayspoc3.git' } } stage ("Sonar_Analysis") { steps{ echo "Sonar Analysis has started" sh "cd scanner; mvn sonar:sonar \ -Dsonar.projectKey=camp_backend \ -Dsonar.projectName=camp_backend \ -Dsonar.host.url=http://192.168.3.76:9000/sonarqube \ -Dsonar.java.binaries=. \ -Dsonar.login=25534cb4ff60d377ca72aefd244d70eff8bfcf56" } } } post { always { emailext subject: "Jenkins Job Report For ${APPLICATION_NAME} - ${currentBuild.currentResult}", body: "BUILD DETAILS: ${BUILD_DETAILS}
BUILD STATUS: ${currentBuild.currentResult}", to: "${NOTIFYUSERS}" } }}
